title: Code more accurately and quickly with Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022, now only $40
content:
Macworld

If you’re a developer or a business with web development needs, then you know how challenging it can be to align your team’s codes accurately and quickly. Fortunately, programming collaboration and help are within reach when you get Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022.

Microsoft Visual Studio Pro is a fully featured development environment and the first 64-bit IDE that can make working with complex code and workloads more seamless. Through April 2, lifetime access to Visual Studio Pro is only $39.97 (reg. $499). 

Used by programmers worldwide, Visual Studio Pro is loved thanks to its ability to help developers build across platforms and languages. Programmers can build highly responsive Web UIs in C# with Blazor, adjust running ASP.NET pages’s web design, and more.

This software also helps speed up work days with features like IntelliCode, which automatically offers clickable options to complete a line or block of code. Meanwhile, CodeLens can provide programmers with valuable insight into their code so they can make more informed decisions, and LiveShare promotes greater collaboration among developers, offering tools to ensure consistent code and faster editing and debugging cycles.

You have until April 2 at 11:59 PM Pacific to get lifetime access to Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 for Windows for just $39.97. No coupon required!
